summary: In the former Czechoslovakia, 1950s, police captain Hakl investigates a jewelery robbery. An opened safe deposit leads to a known burglar. What seems an easy case soon starts to tangle. ... See full summary »
cast: Ivan Trojan|Sebastian Koch|Sona Norisová|Jirí Stepnicka|David Svehlík|Marek Taclík|Filip Antonio|Martin Mysicka|Miroslav Krobot|Halka Tresnáková|Simona Babcáková|Krystof Mucha|Jaroslav Achab Haidler|Richard Stanke|Norbert Lichý|Magdalena Zimová|Hynek Cermák|Ales Najbrt|Tomás Bambusek|Jaroslava Adamová|Ondrej Malý|Klára Pollertová|Sergej Raiter|Václav Neuzil|Martha Issová|Martin Hofmann|David Máj|Jaroslava Pokorná|Jakub Zácek|Lukás Príkazský|Tomás Tobola|Jan Spanbauer|Adam Kubista|Jan Mazák|Jan Novotný|Jan Santroch|Karel Dobrý|Jaroslav Plesl|Marek Daniel|Boguslaw Bury|Markéta Dergelová|Michal Hofbauer|Mariana Issa|Tomás Jerábek|Kamila Kalousová|Eva Kratochvílová|Adam Kraus|Aneta Krípalová|Nella Krípalová|David Listvan|Marie Ludvíková|Stepánka Ludvíková|Rudolf Ondrícek|Igor Orozovic|Aleksander Pindal|Robert Senki|Jan Slovák|Milan Sticha|Justin Svoboda|Mujdat Sönmez|Alexandra Vondrácková
title: Ve stínu
